# Contribution Guidelines

Thank you for the interest in the project! You rock ðŸ¤˜
Use your best judgment, and feel free to propose changes to this document in a pull request.

## Summary

- All suggestions, proposals, bug reports and feature requests are welcome in the form of issues
- Feel free to open pull requests with or without an issue related to it

## How make a pull request

- Fork the repository / [How to fork a repo](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/quickstart/fork-a-repo)
- Create a new branch in your the repo (optional)
- Push the changes to your repo
- Click "Create pull request" button on the notification atop of your github repo main page
- Fill in title and description
- Submit
